Wash rice and dal thoroughly in separate bowls
Soak rice and fenugreek seeds in water
Soak urad dal in water separately
Drain water. Grind urad dal to a fluffy, smooth batter
Grind rice to a slightly coarse paste
Mix both batters together in a large pot with salt
Cover and let ferment in a warm place
Heat a cast iron tawa or non-stick pan on medium heat
Pour a ladle of batter and spread in a circular motion
Drizzle 1 tsp oil/ghee around the edges
Cook until the bottom turns golden brown and crisp
Fold the dosa (add potato masala now if desired) and remove
Serve hot with chutney and sambar
